title: Corellon's Grace
content:
Corellon's Grace Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Natural Pugilist: You gain a +1 bonus to Unarmed Attack Rolls and damage. Unhampered Resistance: While the wielder is not wearing armour, they receive a +2 bonus to Saving Throws. Main Hand OnlyTopple This light, flexible staff is of elven make, marked with mithral sigils that channel magic in the blink of an eye. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 100

Corellon's Grace

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands
